virtual-sensor.name: Rooftop_DozerEventLogger_4355_demux
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerEventLoggerMsg) from Rooftop deployment in usable form

source.query: select TIMED, GEN_TIME - PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME0 * 1000 as timestamp, HEADER_SEQNR as sequence_number, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as node_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID0 as event_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0 as type, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE0=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE0) as value from wrapper

select TIMED, GEN_TIME - PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME1 * 1000 as timestamp, HEADER_SEQNR as sequence_number, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as node_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID1 as event_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE1 as type, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE1=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE1) as value from wrapper

select TIMED, GEN_TIME - PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME2 * 1000 as timestamp, HEADER_SEQNR as sequence_number, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as node_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID2 as event_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE2 as type, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE2=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE2) as value from wrapper

select TIMED, GEN_TIME - PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TIME6 * 1000 as timestamp, HEADER_SEQNR as sequence_number, HEADER_ORIGINATORID as node_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_ID6 as event_id, PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE6 as type, IF(PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_TYPE6=0,NULL,PAYLOAD_EVENTLOG_VALUE6) as value from wrapper
